Welcome to Enchanting Revised.

This mod reworks the enchanting system to remove RNG and XP while still maintaining a vanilla feel.

This mod is heavily customizable through configs. This book assumes you're using the default settings.

Enchanting Altar

This new work station allows you to craft enchantments through recipes.

They can be applied to a book or directly to a tool, weapon, or armour.

The vanilla enchanting table is removed.

Villager Trading

Librarians no longer provide enchanted books, instead they provide Echoing Books which can be used to duplicate an enchanted book in the anvil.

Mending Enchantment

The mending enchantment has been changed, it now provides a slow repair-over-time, extending the lifetime of your tools without requiring XP.

Anvil

The anvil is your main way to repair tools.

It no longer costs XP, there is no limit to the number of repairs, and you can repair netherite with diamonds.

Vanilla XP

Since enchanting, repairing, and mending no longer cost XP, it has been removed completely.

Misc

The anvil no longer creates stronger enchantments when combining two weaker ones.

Librarians now sell lapis.
